original_text: And they set out from the mountains of Abarim and camped in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho;
korean_text: 아바림 산을 떠나 여리고 맞은편 요단 강 가 모압 평지에 진을 쳤으니

sentences.original_text: And they set out from the mountains of Abarim
and camped in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho;
sentences.korean_translation: 요단 강가 여리고의 모압 평원에 진을 쳤다;
